com.ibm.mq.explorer.ms0s.mqsceditor

Class MQSCEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • TextEditor
      • com.ibm.mq.explorer.ms0s.mqsceditor.MQSCEditor

  • public class MQSCEditor
extends TextEditor

    This is the main TextEditor class. It overrides all of the methods in TextEditor that it needs or are required. It handles connecting the document content with the Editor views and performs save operation on the document.
